pages.text: Reaching through the world with $(l:apparatus/runic_shears)Runic Shears$() allows the gathering of many items from the fey, including those freely given by denizens of the fey - equivalent to many of the creatures of our world that drop leather.

$(info) It is not possible to continuously gather fey leather, as the energies required vary per entity, and sometimes those entities are exhausted by the process.$(br2)Generally speaking, any creature that drops leather by default can be used to access fey leather.
